title: RiTo, WhAT DiD I GeT ChAt bAn 4

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body:
Honestly.

This is injustice 





>owning it
>making satire thread about myself

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: undeserved ban rito give this man his rewards back

ah.
ah.
ah.
What the fuck do I say @the Djinn

Well, to quote Kuprum Maxlol of Hiveswap:

> > when you get owned
> > OWN IT

Hopefully you'll work to better adhere to the Summoner's Code, but you're already past the first step - acknowledging and accepting the mistake.

I try man, it took me nearly a year to get to the last checkpoint before honor level 3, but you know... Sometimes, you just gotta tell it how it is and accept the consequences. Lol

Edit: This post isn't condoning saying what I said, but since the words are out I wouldn't want to take them back since I still believe them to be true, and I have zero doubts the player I was talking to received an equal or worse punishment. So maybe I felt like I was slaying an evildoer but ended up just fanning the flames, I recognize the irony of the situation
i mean i  think this type of toxic is justified tho
